channel.title: Encrypting help
channel.description: i had a server, and someone i left on my computer on tv has encryprted my server the server still works, but all the files are class. & no java files does anyoen know how to get them back or change the files.

item.title: Encrypting help
item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

The Class files are what the computer actually uses to run your server - the Java files are for your benefit. The developer edits the Java files, then compiles them, which outputs the Class files that you see.

To get Java files from Class files, you need to find a program to do the opposite process: a decompiler.

Several exist, and several really suck. I prefer JODE (http://jode.sourceforge.net/) or JD (http://java.decompiler.free.fr/). To find downloads for those, Google away.

Read full topic
